text: Khawa thengnga ra-nga huuina marwaan tirton khan ama tampalooi kha aleitum. Kei'n arsi inkhat nuoipil chungnga ijuota kha kaleimu, halli amadiang adongna kaboi khur sousung kha inleipeii.9:1: Adongna kaboi khur Nuoipil suungnga ahekna chongtan nikhuo tungmaklaiseng raikhuo ngai khumna mun eii.
